title: fraud prevention
extract: Internal controls are the plans and/or programs implemented to safeguard your company's assets, ensure the integrity of its accounting records, and deter and detect fraud and theft. Segregation of duties is an important component of internal control that can reduce the risk of fraud from occurring.Jun 5, 2014
